meanings.definition: A division of the academic year in schools or colleges, typically lasting around 15-18 weeks.
meanings.sent1: In college, we have two semesters each year.
meanings.sent2: The fall semester starts in September and ends in December.
meanings.sent3: During the semester, students were buried in books like never before.
meanings.sent4: The semester was a marathon of exams and assignments.
meanings.sent5: The semester felt like a never-ending journey of learning.

meanings.definition: The two main periods into which a school or college year is divided.
meanings.sent1: Semesters help organize the academic year into manageable chunks.
meanings.sent2: The spring and summer semesters offer different courses.
meanings.sent3: The semesters were like two halves of a delicious sandwich.
meanings.sent4: Navigating through the semesters felt like a journey with two distinct destinations.
meanings.sent5: The semesters marked the rhythm of the school year.
